original_title: In the Ass of the Father
overview: Not for the first time, director John Smith taps into a rich religious vein to give us a top-notch display of Church life from the inside, where the battle for hearts and souls always seems to come second-best to the battle for hard cocks and hungry, pert asses! Jaro Stone, Yuri Adamov, Mike James and new-boy cutie, Carl Ross, form a stellar cast of dick-crazed talent, all hell-bent in experiencing the lesser-known sacrament of double-dicked fucking and a baptism of hot piss! Life in holy orders has rarely looked so earthy – or so much fuckin’ fun!
title: In the Ass of the Father
